chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: UniformSpace

Goal:
forall D E : T -> Prop, open D -> open E -> open (fun x : T => D x /\ E x)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For Cj: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For D: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF
open = fun D : T -> Prop => forall x : T, D x -> locally x D : (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
Module FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E : Sig Definition t : Set. Definition eq : positive -> positive -> Prop. Definition eq_refl : forall x : t, x = x. Definition eq_sym : forall x y : t, x = y -> y = x. Definition eq_trans : forall x y z : t, x = y -> y = z -> x = z. Definition bits_lt : positive -> positive -> Prop. Definition lt : positive -> positive -> Prop. Definition bits_lt_trans : forall x y z : positive, bits_lt x y -> bits_lt y z -> bits_lt x z. Definition lt_trans : forall x y z : t, lt x y -> lt y z -> lt x z. Definition bits_lt_antirefl : forall x : positive, ~ bits_lt x x. Definition lt_not_eq : forall x y : t, lt x y -> ~ eq x y. Definition compare : forall x y : t, OrderedType.Compare lt eq x y. Definition eq_dec : forall x y : positive, {x = y} + {x <> y}. End := OrderedTypeEx.PositiveOrderedType
open_ext : forall D E : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, D x <-> E x) -> open D -> open E
locally_open : forall D E : T -> Prop, open D -> (forall x : T, D x -> E x) -> forall x : T, D x -> locally x E
completeness : forall E : R -> Prop, bound E -> (exists x : R, E x) -> {m : R | is_lub E m}
within = fun (T : Type) (D : T -> Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : T -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => D x -> P x) : forall T : Type, (T -> Type) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
within_filter : forall (T : Type) (D : T -> Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> Filter (within D F)
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
is_lub = fun (E : R -> Prop) (m : R) => is_upper_bound E m /\ (forall b : R, is_upper_bound E b -> m <= b) : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
is_upper_bound = fun (E : R -> Prop) (m : R) => forall x : R, E x -> x <= m : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [T : UniformSpace |- Filter ?F]
is_filter_lim = fun (T : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (x : T) => forall P : T -> Prop, locally x P -> F P : forall T : UniformSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
filtermapi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => exists y : U, f x y /\ P y) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
locally' = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) => within (fun y : T => y <> x) (locally x) : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
fct_ball_sym : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x y : T -> U) (e : R), fct_ball T U x e y -> fct_ball T U y e x
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
fct_ball_triangle : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x y z : T -> U) (e1 e2 : R), fct_ball T U x e1 y -> fct_ball T U y e2 z -> fct_ball T U x (e1 + e2) z
fct_ball_center : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x : T -> U) (e : posreal), fct_ball T U x e x
at_point = fun (T : UniformSpace) (a : T) (P : T -> Prop) => P a : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
filterlimi_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop) (y : ?U), filterlimi f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => exists z : ?U, f x z /\ ball y eps z)) where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace] ?F : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [T : UniformSpace |- Filter ?F]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [T : UniformSpace |- Filter ?F]
Record ProperFilter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_ProperFilter { filter_ex : forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x; filter_filter : Filter F } For ProperFilter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope _]
fct_UniformSpace = fun (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) => UniformSpace.Pack (T -> U) (fct_UniformSpace_mixin T U) (T -> U) : Type -> UniformSpace -> UniformSpace Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
locally_locally : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
filter_ex : forall P : ?T -> Prop, at_point ?a P -> exists x : ?T, P x where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace] ?a : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
filterlimi_locally_close : forall (f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop) (l l' : ?U), at_point ?a (fun x : ?T => forall y1 y2 : ?U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2) -> filterlimi f (at_point ?a) (locally l) -> filterlimi f (at_point ?a) (locally l') -> close l l' where ?U : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace] ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace] ?a : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [T : UniformSpace |- Filter ?F]
locally_ex_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y} where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
is_filter_lim_filter_le : forall x : ?T, filter_le ?G ?F -> is_filter_lim ?F x -> is_filter_lim ?G x where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace] ?F : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop]
locally_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
filtermap_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> Filter (filtermap f F)
filterlim = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermap f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filterlimi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermapi f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace] ?F : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [T : UniformSpace |- Filter ?F]
IVT : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x < y -> f x < 0 -> 0 < f y -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
IVT_cor : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x <= y -> f x * f y <= 0 -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
locally_singleton : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> P x where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_const : forall a : ?U, filterlim (fun _ : ?T => a) ?F (locally a) where ?T : [T : UniformSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace] ?F : [T : UniformSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [T : UniformSpace |- Filter ?F]

```coq
intros T D E HD HE x [xD Ex].
split.
- apply HD, xD.
- apply HE, Ex.
Qed.```
